serviceDescription: Google's multimodal AI models for text generation, vision analysis, and embeddings

geminiGenerateText.description: Generate text using Google Gemini models with customizable parameters

geminiAnalyzeImage.description: Analyze images using Gemini's vision capabilities - describe, extract text, or answer questions

geminiChat.description: Have a multi-turn conversation with Gemini while maintaining context

geminiEmbedText.description: Generate text embeddings for semantic search and similarity matching
